name: BoxBoxBox 3D Endless Runner
description:
Welcome to BoxBoxBox 3D runner

Hi and thank you for spending some time on this game page :) 
This is a early beta build for my upcoming 3D Endless Runner game "BoxBoxBox". Filled with boxes and wacky physics. At the moment I have only included 2 Sections in the build. More will come later when I release the final game.

Controls:

WASD and Arrow keys both work.

Press "Space" To jump. There is double jump enabled. Touch ground to refresh.
You can never stop your Box. Only slow down or speed up.
Q and "Esc" goes back and exit the game. 
R is for quick Retry / Restart run.

"Trailer"

Feedback

Feel free to send any feedback to josh@topswagcode.com or here in the comments.
